channel.title: Staff on ZooBerry

item.title: Adelaide Zoo Staff
item.description: Reskins the zookeepers to wear uniforms with the Adelaide Zoo logo.

item.title: Anniversary Staff
item.description: A new staff to celebrate Zoo Admin’s 5th Anniversary! Special Uniforms and Podium for all your staff including the Vendors.

item.title: WWF Zookeeper Outfit
item.description: This replaces your current Zookeeper outfit with a new one emblazoned with the WWF logo.

item.title: Zoo Admin Tribute Staff
item.description: This replaces your current Zookeeper outfit with a new one emblazoned with the WWF logo.

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!
